issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Run test 1107 from http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/UI+Composite+Layout+Behavior+Test+Case

Actual Result:
Blue view is displayed over orange view

Expected Result:
Orange view should be displayed over blue view, blue is added to the parent first and then orange
fields.summary: iOS: when zIndex are the same, iOS are not displaying the views in the order they are added

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed and lack of progress since the opening of the ticket. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
